text: Frankie Billy Randall (September 25, 1961 – December 23, 2020) was an American professional boxer. He competed from 1983 to 2005. He was a three-time light welterweight world champion, having held the WBA, WBC, and lineal titles between 1994 and 1997. He was born in Birmingham, Alabama. Randall died on December 23, 2020 in Birmingham at the age of 59.Frankie “The Surgeon” Randall – 1961 To 2020 ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American boxers Category:Sportspeople from Birmingham, Alabama
title: Frankie Randall
